descriptionHtml:
[center]Just when I think I cant have more fun with spells
Adds a spell WATCHY THE VIDEO!
[youtube]ZRKDWRjKepM[/youtube]

As usual Discworld Trailers
[youtube]FEBNe8XINd0[/youtube]

[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]



[/center]


Mod adds a spell tome outside Riverwood
ESP comes in two versions, one makes essential characters immune, the other wtf pwns them as well
The spell will only affect actors with actortypeNPC keywords IE pretty much all living humanoids
The spell requires a Filled Black AND Grand soul gem in your inventory to fire, welcome to reagents amg it's vanilla wow!
It will remove said reagents upon effect start IE immune characters will not remove your reagents
When it murders a essential character sometimes it does not move their loot to the charred remains, no idea why, if anyone can clarify please do so. I am removing essential from the actor base as well as killing essential via script to be doubly sure
Have fun blowing stuff up
author: darren83
